about.title: Crafting Digital Excellence
about.description: We're a team of passionate developers and designers dedicated to creating exceptional web experiences that drive business growth.
about.excellenceDescription: We strive for excellence in everything we do, from code quality to client communication.
about.innovationDescription: We embrace new technologies and creative solutions to solve complex problems.
about.reliabilityDescription: We deliver on our promises and maintain the highest standards of reliability.

contact.readyToStart: Ready to start your project? Contact us today and let's discuss how we can help bring your vision to life.
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our web development services and process.
faq.servicesAnswer: We offer a full range of web development services including custom website development, web applications, UI/UX design, and ongoing maintenance and support.
faq.projectTimeline: How long does it take to complete a project?
faq.timelineAnswer: Project timelines vary depending on complexity and scope. A simple website might take 4-6 weeks, while more complex web applications can take 3-6 months or more.
faq.processAnswer: Our process includes discovery, planning, design, development, testing, and deployment phases. We maintain clear communication throughout and involve clients in key decisions.
faq.supportAnswer: Yes, we offer various maintenance and support packages to ensure your website or application remains secure, up-to-date, and performing optimally.
faq.technologiesAnswer: We use modern technologies including Angular, Vue, Node.js, Python, Django & Rest Framework and other cutting-edge tools depending on project requirements.

home.companyApproach: YOUR COMPANY'S APPROACH TO WEB DEVELOPMENT
home.heroTitle: We create powerful websites that drive your business forward
home.heroDescription: Transform your online presence with our cutting-edge web development solutions. We build websites that convert visitors into customers.
home.customWebsitesDescription: We design and develop beautiful, responsive websites that reflect your brand and engage your audience.
home.webApplicationsDescription: From simple tools to complex systems, we build web applications that streamline your business processes.
home.ongoingSupportDescription: We provide continuous support and maintenance to ensure your digital presence remains strong and up-to-date.
home.missionDescription: At Alpha Technology Group, we believe in the power of technology to transform businesses and enhance user experiences. Our mission is to deliver innovative web solutions that help our clients succeed in the digital landscape.
home.innovationFirstDescription: We stay ahead of the curve with cutting-edge technologies and methodologies.
home.clientSuccessDescription: Your success is our success. We're committed to delivering results that exceed expectations.
home.partnershipApproachDescription: We work closely with our clients, forming long-lasting partnerships built on trust.

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.disclosure: Information and disclosure according to §5 (1) ECG, § 25 Media Act, § 63 Trade Regulation Act, and § 14 Commercial Code
imprint.onlineDisputeResolution: Online dispute resolution: Consumers residing in Austria or in another contracting state of the ODR Regulation have the opportunity to resolve problems regarding the paid purchase of goods or services through online dispute resolution (according to OS, AStG). The European Commission provides a platform for this: https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr
imprint.copyright: Copyright: The contents of this website are subject to various protection rights (e.g., copyright) as far as legally possible. Any use/distribution of provided material that is prohibited by copyright requires the written consent of the website operator.
imprint.disclaimer: Disclaimer: Despite careful content control, the website operator of this website assumes no liability for the contents of external links. The content of the linked pages is the sole responsibility of their operators. If you become aware of outgoing links that refer to a website with illegal activities/information, we ask for appropriate notice to remove them immediately according to § 17 Abs. 2 ECG. The copyright of third parties is respected by the operator of this website with the utmost care. If you still become aware of a copyright infringement, we ask for an appropriate notice. Upon becoming aware of such legal violations, we will remove the affected content immediately.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your information when You use the Service and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You.
privacy.interpretation: The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions.
privacy.definitions: For the purposes of this Privacy Policy:
privacy.account: Account means a unique account created for You to access our Service or parts of our Service.
privacy.affiliate: Affiliate means an entity that controls, is controlled by or is under common control with a party.
privacy.company: Company refers to ATG-AT IT-Dienstleistungen GmbH, Werndlweg 11 4050 Traun.
privacy.cookies: Cookies are small files that are placed on Your computer, mobile device or any other device by a website.
privacy.device: Device means any device that can access the Service.
privacy.personalData: Personal Data is any information that relates to an identified or identifiable individual.
privacy.serviceProvider: Service Provider means any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the Company.
privacy.usageData: Usage Data refers to data collected automatically.
privacy.website: Website refers to Alpha Technology Group, accessible from https://www.atg-at.net/
privacy.you: You means the individual accessing or using the Service.
privacy.collectingAndUsingYourPersonalData: Collecting and Using Your Personal Data
privacy.personalDataDescription: While using Our Service, We may ask You to provide Us with certain personally identifiable information.
privacy.contactDetails: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, You can contact us:

services.title: Our Services
services.description: From concept to deployment, we offer end-to-end web development services tailored to your needs.
services.customWebsiteDescription: We create bespoke websites that are tailored to your brand and business needs. Our sites are responsive, fast, and optimized for search engines.
services.webApplicationDescription: We develop powerful, scalable web applications that help businesses streamline their operations and improve efficiency.
services.uiUxDescription: Our design team creates intuitive, user-friendly interfaces that enhance user experience and drive engagement.
services.maintenanceDescription: We offer ongoing maintenance and support to ensure your digital products remain secure, up-to-date, and performing optimally.
